content: I've been stocking up on materials recently and made this <style=Highlight>Crop Garden Building Kit</style> from memory. Here, take it...
info: 赠送作物园-云果_主流程文本II

content: Pick a nice spot to place it and I'll water it for you every day, okay mah~? {A开心}<style=SizeSmall>Think I'll be able to grow some giant fruit mah?</style>
info: 赠送作物园-云果_主流程文本II

content: {A开心}<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I've been thinkin' about this for so long... I really want to grow sproutsies with you!
info: 赠送作物园-云果_主流程文本II

content: I'm kinda hopeless at everythin' else, {A害羞冒烟}but f-farmin'? That I'm really good at~! I was born with a green thumb, y'know.
info: 赠送作物园-云果_主流程文本II

content: When I used to farm with Gran'mama mah, we'd make little crop gardens. Smaller scale makes 'em easier to tend to. Let's try making one together mah~!
info: 赠送作物园-云果_主流程文本II
